name: Fairy Island Quest
description:
Fairy island quest is a classic point-and-click andventure game.

Arriving on a small island to resupply the ship you found yourself entangled in lives of the habitants. Why would a strong viking be crying in the middle of a forest? What do octopuses need rope for? What hides in a dark cave? Embark on a short quest to find answers to these questions and find some friends along the way.
